sub_title: Dedicated to Patient Quality of Life | Medical Device R&D Leader | Global Director of Engineering at Philips Healthcare
summary:
•	A seasoned ambitious individual raised in a multi-cultural environment with international living and working experience for more than two and half decades in EUROPE 8+ years | CHINA 10+ years | INDIA 10+ years.

•	High affinity towards meaningful Innovation, Intrapreneurship and Passion in delivering cutting edge enabling technologies.

•	28+ years Industry experience spread across varied domains currently Medical Device & Healthcare Solutions with prior experience in Consumer Electronics, Semiconductor, Industrial Automation, Automotive and Telecom. 

•	Key roles Chief Technology Officer (CTO), Global Medical Device PMO, Head of Embedded Systems, QMS Management Representative (MR), R&D Program Management (PM) and Systems Engineering.

•	Comprehensive experience in Medical Device Design & Development, Manufacturing and Post Market | High-tech Industry | Embedded Systems Engineering | Industrial Robotics | 3C (Computing, Communication, and Consumer) | Global Product Development & NPI Launches | Product Engineering Services.

•	Initiatives led LEAN R&D | Global Program Leadership | Global Business Integration | Emerging Market Initiatives | R&D Process Innovation | Intellectual Property (IP) | Product Innovation | Enabling Technologies | Transformation & Change Management.

•	Demonstrated comfort in ambiguous environment by successfully delivering 1st Industrial Robot, 1st Indigenous Car Plant Automation, 1st Offshore Development Center (ODC), 1st All-In-One PC Portfolio, 1st MRI Scanner, 1st NICU of Future Solution and more.

•	Successful track record in setting up emerging initiatives within corporates, startup business initiative and led ventures building core foundation - competencies, solutions and processes. MedTech Start-up | Technology Scouting | Fund Raising.

•	Ability to lead and guide diverse multi-disciplinary teams, ability to collaborate with customers, partners, vendors and teams.

Key Specialities and Interests

•	Strong exposure to Global Product Development & Launches including Emerging Market initiatives spread across Medical & Healthcare Solutions, Embedded Systems Technologies, 3C (Computer, Communication and Consumer Electronics) Technologies, Program Management, Systems Engineering.

•	Innovative Medical Device Solutions | Digital Healthcare Transformation | Connected Health | Clinical Grade Wearable's | Remote Patient Monitoring | Precision Health | Healthcare Robotics.

school.name: Bharati Vidyapeeth’s Jawaharlal Nehru Institute Of Technology

profile_positions.description:
•	Co-leading engineering adoption of innovation portfolio and program initiatives by steering global hardware development teams across sites in Best (Netherlands), Caesarea (Israel), and Pune (India) for hardware platform enhancements (NPI) and sustaining (LCM) initiatives covering obsolescence management, dual sourcing, supplier de-risking, cost productivity, and manufacturing transfers.

•	End to End functional delivery to scale up first-generation KODEX Electrophysiology open hardware platform (Real-time 3D Cardiac Imaging & Navigation Solution for RF and Cryo ablation) with unique body surface dielectric sensing through NPI and LCM programs which includes EU MDD to MDR Transition, Design Controls Integration, Design Transfer, DHF Migration, CAPA, Complaints resolutions, and QMS transition initiatives.

Key Contributions & Achievements :
•	Steer and guide the Philips EPD venture in pursuit of facilitating integration, transfer, and harmonizing global way of working in compliance by adhering to Philips Excellence Process Framework.
•	Collaboration engineering initiatives in EPD Caesarea, Israel and participate in the development of key strategy for building and expanding an EPD Hardware CoE function footprint in the Netherlands.
•	Established and led internal & external teams of 20+ professionals for global medical device development. Communicate and liaise articulately between the Philips EPD Venture and Philips Engineering Solutions, contributing to the development of existing and next-generation open hardware platform.
•	Developed flexibility in therapy choice through an KODEX open hardware platform, by interfacing growing portfolio of catheters from Abbott, APT, Biosense Webster, Biotronik, Boston Scientific, and Medtronic.
profile_positions.title: Global Director of Engineering

company.name: EUROPE based MedTech OEM's (Corporate and SME’s)

profile_positions.company: EUROPE based MedTech OEM's (Corporate and SME’s)
profile_positions.description:
Offered client-centric consultancy services, leveraging expertise in global medical device development covering product device safety risk management, usability engineering and clinical benefit-risk assessments.

Key Engagements:
Medical Device Consultancy (European Life Sciences Organization)
•	Delivered Quality & Regulatory  consultation for SaMD Platform & EU MDR based Class II medical devices.
 
Elderly Care Incontinence Management Solution (European OEM)
•	Guided research and development PoC of single use (disposable) wireless and battery-less sensing solution. Facilitated hospital to home care for elderly remote patient monitoring platform interfacing 3rd party CE marked COTS medical grade vital signs monitoring wearable devices. 

Diabetes Insulin Therapy Solution (Netherlands based OEM)
•	Advocacy on Medical Device Compliance & Safety Risk Management for type 1 diabetes treatment a wireless insulin pump therapy solution for CB type testing strategy and execution with NRTL (DEKRA) test lab & DHF remediation for MDD-based CE Marking.

Medical Device Development (Netherlands based OEM)
•	Planned, devised, and implemented product development strategies to establish a robust foundation and pave the way for the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU) Solution. Acted as Management Representative (MR) for deploying ISO 13485 and FDA-based harmonized Quality Management Systems (QMS) and guiding process owners, EU notified body audits.

Key Contributions & Achievements:
•	Established, fostered strategic Co-Innovation partnerships with global design and manufacturing partners.
•	Steered end-to-end activities surrounding soft skin wearable wireless solution architecture and technology scouting, design and development, system engineering and manufacturing vendor management.
•	Remediated product testing and certification to effectively overcome a product recall within 120 days.
•	Achieved end-to-end QMS 13485 deployment, audit readiness, and certification in 15 months.
profile_positions.title: Medical Device Innovation Executive

profile_positions.description:
•	Leadership to a cross-functional core team that includes experts from, Systems Engineering, Design & Development, Quality & Regulatory Affairs, Clinical, Human factors, Finance, Marketing, Operations & Service.

•	Lead technology-driven products and programs having R&D budgets $5 to $20M. Global Program & Development Management responsibility for Global New Product Introductions - NPI's for Advanced Diagnostics Imaging, MRI Systems conforming ISO13485 Medical Device Directive, FDA & ROW regulatory compliance.

•	The key accomplishments – led 1st Value Segment MRI Program for emerging markets enabling delivery from Asia / China Greenfield facility with collaboration five global development sites on-time delivery with quality to meet Time to Market & Cost target for value product segment.

•	End to End activities include Design & Development, System Integration, Verification & Validation, Sourcing & Manufacturing.

•	Collaboration with Multi-site Manufacturing & Global Development ensuring on-time delivery with quality to meet Time to Market & Cost targets.

•	Led diverse multidisciplinary global teams with ability to collaborate smoothly with customers, partners, vendors and multi-skills, multi-site, multi-cultural and multi-lingual teams.

•	Solid exposure to QMS harmonization across modalities, Philips Product Creation Process, Quality and Regulatory & Business Processes.
profile_positions.title: PMO -Global Programs (MRI Diagnostics Imaging)

profile_positions.description:
•	End‐To‐End Development Program Management of Worldwide All‐In‐One Desktop’s Development and Launches including Emerging Market initiatives.

•	Lead cross‐functional AIO teams for past four product generations since 2007 including 12+ AIO NPI Developments driving niche concepts/ID designs, optimized System architecture definition, Design & Development, Rapid Prototyping & rigorous System Validation.

•	Identified and drove sustaining process improvements engaging Tier1 ODM partners to achieve effective Production ramp, Continuity of Supply, continuous Feature enhancements and Value Engineering initiatives through end of Product Sales/Manufacturing life cycle.

•	Cross‐functional team leader with strong PC Architecture, Chassis & System design experience leading an internal Program, external ODM & Technology partners to develop time to market products achieving Cost, Quality & Schedule goals through the Phase Review Process. 

•	Multiple Global Product Awards from PCWorld, CNET & Hardware Heaven, and multiple individual On‐The‐Spot Awards granted for various program & business crisis management achievements.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Development Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	As Embedded Systems Practice Head, track record of setting up 40+ member team and expanding Embedded Systems Competency Center and Offsite Development Center (ODC) for global semiconductor major at China, Shanghai. 

•	Managed diverse development teams Hardware, Mechanical & System Software for Telecom & Mobility device product development & services. Guided, coached and co‐work with team to expand capabilities on a variety of aspects including business development, technology, innovation & processes.

•	Demonstrated ability to manage Multisite, Multicultural & Multilingual teams. The team size varying from 3 to 40 based on project requirements and capable of creating realistic project schedules and executing to meet commitments with buy‐in from team members and other organizational functions.

•	Developed products based on Intel XScale IXP Network, Digital Media, Motorola PowerPC MPC & DSP Processors Architectures with good exposure on Digital, Analog and Mixed circuit designs. Knowledge in SI, EMI/EMC and Reliability Prediction. Board‐level and System simulation, verification, testing and prototype development. Involved in architecting the system software, design and development of bootloader, BSP for boards with PowerQuicc family of processor, OS Porting & board bring up.
profile_positions.title: Practice Head, Embedded Systems (China & India)

profile_positions.description:
•	Development and Validation of Equipment Control Application (Substrate Management System) in
Semiconductor automation with advanced automation solutions provider to semiconductor giant fab's worldwide. Familiarity with SEMI standards and scenarios.

•	Hardware and Firmware development for Engine Parameter Scanner based on 16bit Processor MODBUS (RTU), Paperless Recorder based on Intel 80386 Processor with MicroOS II Real time kernel.

•	Developed Device Management Software for Smart UPS developed using VC++ with MFC and industrial product development using Microchip’s PIC micro family.

•	Exposure on High Speed Board, System design using CISC, RISC Processors, CPLDs, FPGAs & ASICs. High PCB Design & Layout, Component Selection & Evaluation, Vendor Development & Manufacturing support. Hands on experience on complete Product Development Life Cycle (PDLC), with good technical understanding of hardware issues & engineering tradeoffs made in the course of product development.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Embedded Systems Engineer

company.name: Tata Motors ( Electronics Division, Pune, India )

profile_positions.description:
•	Design, Development and Integration of PC‐PLC based control systems, advanced automation systems, industrial robotics, automotive electronics, control engineering, electronics and electrical instrumentation.

•	Development of PLC based control systems for Fixtures, Lift & Carry and Gantry including hardware system integration and software PLC Ladder programming using Allen Bradley’s Automatic Programming Software (APS). Interface programming for Gantry System using Allen Bradley Servo drives. Weld Process Monitoring Software for Weld (BIW) Shop.

•	Development and Validation of Robotic Controllers for Spot Welding, Sealant and Material handling Robotic applications comprising of Nachi, Kawasaki, Fanuc, and Kuka make industrial robots. Key contribution for Plant Automation for first indigenous Indian Indica car plant at Tata Motors.
profile_positions.title: Automation Systems Engineer

company.name: Precision Automation and Robotics India Ltd., Omnitek Systems & Omega Controls Pune India

profile_positions.description:
•	Hands on experience on various Industrial robot programming, teaching, path planning and optimization. Programming, testing and proving the Material‐handling robot on PCB punching press, PCB handling robot has an application of loading of blank PCB’s & unloading of punched PCB’s, installed for Philips, India.

•	Special Purpose Machine (SPM) for Packaging Application, I was involved for testing and providing of hardware and software design interface for PLC and Servo Drive System for packaging machine that consists of DC Servo motor and drive with man machine interface.

•	Design and Development PC Add‐On boards for Industrial Applications like Data loggers, Stepper Motor Controllers and Analog and Digital Interface cards. 8‐bit micro‐controllers and 8/16‐bit microprocessor based embedded system using C and Assembly Languages. Exposure to serial communication interfaces RS232/485, I2C, and ISA Bus Interface using PC XT/AT Add‐On cards.
profile_positions.title: Development Engineer
